Word1.value: wear a watch and always be aware of the time

Word2.value: bring your debit or credit cards to the casino

Word3.value: bring a friend, or have someone pick you up at the casino

Word4.value: plan other fun activities during the day in addition to gambling

Word6.value: keep tabs on your spending in the casino and save some for your next outing

Word7.value: you can always win back your losses
